Title: #374: The Secret of My Success with John C. Maxwell
Description:
Bestselling author John C. Maxwell may be best known as a leadership expert, but there’s another topic he’s even more passionate about: personal development. And for good reason. For nearly  50 years, he says his unwavering commitment to his own personal growth plan has been the secret of his success. Tune in to hear how having a teachable spirit and learning every single day is a game-changer for all areas of your life, including your leadership journey.
